name: Cake Clicker
description:
Cake Clicker is a free-to-play clone of the popular browser game Cookie Clicker, made in the Game Maker engine. This was a hobby project by TheCyberTronn with textures by Lumln and music by PyroAkane.

The game includes:

  • One large, pulsating, sexy-looking cake.
  • Six Famous Bakers to increase how many cakes you click.
  • Ten generic cake makers to make cakes automatically.
  • A music track resembling that of "Temmie Village" in Undertale.

And the best part?

The source code is also available!

So come and download today, to play, or to modify to your heart's content!

(If you do mod the game, please credit myself (TheCyberTronn) as the original creator and programmer, Lumln as the artist of the cake and PyroAkane as the artist of the music.) If you upload a modified version of the game, toss me a tweet (@cybermanme) with the download link. I'd love to see what people do with this!

Thanks to Orteil for the original Cookie Clicker game.

Changelog 1.1.0.2 (09/2/16):

  • Changed visuals slightly
  • Music and fullscreen choices now save.
  • Changed how CPS values are calculated.
